songs.title: Outkast Reunion Tour Jumpsuit Slogans
songs.lyrics:
(Yin-Yang)

X

F#CK 3000

I pray there's a god at the end of all this

Life is short, take more baths

Children of the cornbread

I've never been to afrika

Sorry I forgot to call you back

Obviously oblivious

How good a friend are you

Big girls are beautiful to me

Fruit snack addict

Umm, you still on yo' pyramid?

Across cultures, darker people suffer most. why?

Ok, hand over the cure and stop playing

Art or fart?

I've never had f@ckbook, twitt@r, or inst@gram

Everything is temporary

Ninjas kill me

Breathe

Sloppy wet Poseidon

God. or god?

I love old people

Loners get lonely too

Narcissistic americans

Thinking deeply about shallow s#it

Passionate about compassion

Andre-now-thousand
